messages.title: No more gridlock. No more delays. It’s time to get stuff done.
messages.content: Let’s be honest. The country has been stuck in a rut. Parliament spent the last three years going round in circles - agreeing on nothing except more arguments. Don’t you think it’s time to get on with the country’s priorities? Don’t you think it’s time to stop arguing about the past and start building the kind of future we want?

messages.title: Let’s get the last three years behind us. Let’s get a parliament that works for you.
messages.content: We’ll get Brexit done with our deal that’s ready to go from day one of a new parliament. It protects jobs and trade. Ends uncertainty. And means we can lift our country out of this rut - and get on with the priorities that we all share. Better hospitals. Safer streets. World-class schools. And a growing economy.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Cutting income tax for 32 million people
keyPolicies.policyDescription: If you work hard, you should be able to get on in life. That means keeping your taxes low. Since 2015, we've lifted 1.74 million people out of income tax altogether.
Too many parts of Britain feel left behind. That's why we're investing in every part of Britain. We'll invest over £700 million on new Growth Deals across Wales.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Freezing fuel duty for nine years in a row
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We're taking steps to help with the cost of living. And it's not just about cutting income tax. We've also frozen fuel duty for nine years.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: An extra £1.2 billion for the Welsh NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The NHS is part of our heritage. That's why we've given an extra £1.2 billion for the NHS to the Welsh Government. This will mean an extra investment.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Seats like Brecon and Radnorshire will decide this election. That’s because the Conservatives need to gain seats like this to secure a majority government. Last time, if just 713 more people had changed their minds, the Conservatives would have gained a majority government.

issues.brexitEurope: We’ll get Brexit done with our deal that’s ready to go from day one of a new parliament. It protects jobs and trade. Ends uncertainty.
issues.economy: Better hospitals. Safer streets. World-class schools. And a growing economy.
issues.education: A future where your children get a world-class education - because no school is underfunded or left behind.
issues.government: No more gridlock. No more delays. It’s time to get stuff done.
issues.health: A future where you don’t have to wait three weeks for a GP appointment - because our NHS has the extra funding it needs to thrive.
issues.lawCrime: A future where our streets are safe no matter where you live - because our police have the officers they need to get a grip on crime.
issues.socialWelfare: We’re taking steps to help with the cost of living.

community.content: Seats like Brecon and Radnorshire will decide this election. That’s because the Conservatives need to gain seats like this to secure a majority government.

leaflet.personalStatement: We can unleash Britain’s potential. But it starts with you. At this election, you get to vote on with the country’s priorities. Vote Conservative.

images.caption: Cutting income tax for 32 million people.
Freezing fuel duty for nine years in a row.
An extra £1.2 billion for the Welsh NHS.
